metadata.title: CVE-2022-27416 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain a double-free via__interceptor_free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27416` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
